detail_desc: Blouse in airy cotton poplin with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Yoke with inset lace trims at the front and pin-tucks at the top and long puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs decorated with imitation stone beads made of plastic. Length 2 cm, 4.5 cm and 6 cm.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Ventilation holes under the arms, ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Unlined. Tight fit. Size of chest pocket 10x17.5 cm.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Fine-knit jumper with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved polo-neck top in ribbed jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.

Jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets, flap front pockets, and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with imitation leather details and lacing with speed hooks at the top. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Bolero in fine-knit cotton with a faceted, heart-shaped button and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.

Knee-length dress in lightweight twill made from a viscose and Tencel™ lyocell blend with notch lapels and a wrapover top with a practical jersey inner top for easier nursing access. Flap chest pockets with a button, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, diagonal side pockets and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Padded velvet Alice band.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a viscose blend with a wrapover front and a seam and ties at the waist. Gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidered text on the front and an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Braided bracelets in various designs. Adjustable length.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in fine-knit linen with buttons down the front.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft body in lace and mesh with lace cap sleeves and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a high cut at the back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Coat in woven fabric with a shawl collar and welt side pockets. Detachable belt with D-rings and a tab with press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Cotton twill shoes with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, polo-neck jumper in a wool knit with dropped shoulders and straight, extra-long sleeves. Twisted seams at the front to create a tapered silhouette, and an asymmetric hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length coat in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend with high slits in the sides. Large peak lapels, concealed buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Long sleeves and adjustable cuffs with a tab and button. Yoke with a pleat at the back to create volume and movement. Belt loops at the back and a soft, detachable tie belt with decorative metal eyelets. Contrasting colour satin lining.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard and fabric tab with a text print. Zipped side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Long cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Boxer shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with embroidery, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with a button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly with buttons and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Microfibre hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Large scarf in a soft weave with a lightly brushed finish. Fringe trims along the short sides.

Long-sleeved jacket in soft faux shearling with a high collar, a zip down the front, an appliqué on one sleeve and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams and a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric. Unlined.
Loose-fitting vest top in an airy satin weave with a V-neck front and back.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 9 cm.
Long-sleeved top with an appliqué on the front, a round neck with a press-stud on one shoulder, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Alice band with a decorative knot detail at the top.
Small elasticated scrunchies in various designs.

Jacket in a crisp weave with a lined hood, high collar and elastic drawstring. Zip down the front and front pockets with a concealed zip. Long sleeves with covered elastication and an adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and tapered legs.
Jumper in pattern-knit cotton. Shawl collar with a wrapover front and decorative wooden button, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft knit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Suede loafers with tassels at the front and soft heel caps so they can be worn as slip-ons. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2 cm.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Hairband in a soft weave with a bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Straight-cut jacket in a crêpe weave with sequined embroidery, a small stand-up collar and no fasteners. Lined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and visible elastication at the hem.
Top in a cotton weave with tie-top shoulder straps and wide, frill-trimmed smocking at the top. Seam at the waist and a flared peplum.
Cropped trousers in an airy weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and side pockets.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a round neck and rounded hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs, two pairs with synthetic resin pendants. Length from approx. 3.5 cm to 5 cm.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and a wrapover hood. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Top in a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and 3/4-length sleeves with pleated trumpet cuffs.
Coiled plastic hair elastics.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Metal corkscrew hoop earrings. Diameter 3 cm.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with buttons at the back, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and a decorative tie detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit containing glittery threads with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Jacquard-patterned running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Seamless.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in superstretch twill with embroidery, hard-worn details and a zip fly and button. Cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Trousers in washed, superstretch twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Low ribbed section at the waist.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and contrasting colour trims.
Wide trousers in gently draping twill with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and wide, straight legs with creases.

Lightly padded jacquard-weave jacket in a viscose blend containing glittery threads. Small stand-up collar, diagonal zip at the front and a rounded hem. Welt side pockets and a tab with a press-stud at the sides. Lined.
Sandals in imitation leather with glitter and appliqués. Adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
